Title: One Hundred Clowns
Publisher: Red Guards Shanghai Revolutionary Committee to Defend Mao Zedong Thought (Red Defence Group) "East Wind" Editorial Group (紅卫兵上海市捍卫毛泽东思想革命委员会 (紅捍会）《东风》编辑部)
Notes: Small poster, printed on two sides (the other side is BG C32/477).Below Liu Shaoqi and Deng Xiaoping, 36 caricatures of prominent Party members, specialists, scholars and other functionaries who were under attack.First row: Peng Dehuai, Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi, Yang Shangkun, He Long.Second row: Wang Guangmei, Bo Yibo, An Ziwen, Tao Zhu, Lin Feng and ...
